body_html:
Not a bug. Your optimizer is asked to track the CPU parameters because you feed the parameters to it while they were in CPU. The moving to GPU operation creates new Tensor objects rather than modifying inplace, so the optimizer doesn't know that the parameters are on GPUs.

See notes on "Construct it" at https://pytorch.org/docs/master/optim.html.
